short_definition: A lawsuit brought by a landlord against a tenant to evict the tenant from rental property  usually for nonpayment of rent.
long_definition_html: A lawsuit brought by a landlord against a tenant to evict the tenant from rental property usually for nonpayment of rent.
long_definition_markdown: A lawsuit brought by a landlord against a tenant to evict the tenant from rental property  usually for nonpayment of rent.
long_definition_text: A lawsuit brought by a landlord against a tenant to evict the tenant from rental property  usually for nonpayment of rent.
